dialogue.text: It's time for another episode of everyone's favorite silly slice-of-life series! Gummy's Grand Tales!
On today's episode… Tea Time Troubles!
Gaspers! Mama and Papa ran out of their favorite tea! Now they can't start their day with their favorite, most flavor-ite drinks!
But fear not, viewers! Our tea-less troopers have entrusted me, the humble and lovable protagonist, Gummy!!! -to go on a grand quest to retrieve some more!
And that's where today's episode begins… here in the outskirts of the city, known in legends as Old Togarashi! Gummy makes her way inside, searching for the treasured tea store…
Hmm… guess Herbal's is closed today…
Gummy approaches this strange, foreign land, ready to face whatever challenges are waiting for-
Woah, woah, woah!!! Ehehehehe!! Looks like today's episode features a SPECIAL GUEST!
Lookie, lookie! Its really him! The Flame of Togarashi Town! Or “the ashen cloud behind it” like he says in all his interviews, heh heh.
Only the biggest! You're, like, the number one coolest person ever! When you and Spicy perform, it's like watching a crazy anime fight scene, but it's real!
The way Spicy is all like FWOOOSH with her fire and you come in all like SHWOOOOM from the smoke clouds all cool n’ spooky-like! You're just like the protags of my favorite isekai anime!
This is an extra special episode, yes yes! You sang with a stranger in your own side arc last week, so consider this a callback!
The tea fetching plot can take a quick break, this is important for my character development!
